## Setup

```{r libraries, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
library(knitr)
library(sf)
```



## Data

Load the [selected census variables](100-prep/111-classification-variable-selection.html).

```{r}
census_data_trans_selected <-
  read_csv(
    "../storage/dati-cpa_2011_all-trans-selected-v0_0_3.csv",
    col_types = paste(c(rep("c", 12), rep("d", 125)), collapse="")
  )
```

## Clustering

```{r}
census_data_kmeans_k08 <- 
  census_data_trans_selected %>%
  select(P1_norm_log10_std:E30_E31_norm_log10_std) %>%
  stats::kmeans(
    centers = 8, iter.max = 5000,
    algorithm = "Lloyd"
  )

census_data_ieac_k08 <- 
  census_data_trans_selected %>%
  tibble::add_column(
    ieac_k08 = census_data_kmeans_k08 %$% cluster %>% as.character()
  )
```

## Save values

```{r}
census_data_ieac_k08 %>% 
  write_csv("../storage/ieac_k08-with-vars-v0_0_3.csv") 

census_data_ieac_k08 %>% 
  select(CODREG:CODASC, ieac_k08) %>% 
  write_csv("../storage/ieac_k08-no-vars-v0_0_3.csv") 

enum_areas <- readRDS( "../storage/italian-enumeration-areas-2011.rds")
census_data_ieac_k08_geo <-
  enum_areas %>%
  left_join(
    census_data_ieac_k08 %>% 
    select(CODREG:CODASC, ieac_k08)
  )

census_data_ieac_k08_geo %>% 
  saveRDS("../storage/ieac_k08-with-vars-v0_0_3.rds")

census_data_ieac_k08_geo %>% 
  write_sf("../storage/ieac_k08-with-vars-v0_0_3.geojson")

dir.create("../storage/ieac_k08-with-vars-v0_0_3")
census_data_ieac_k08_geo %>% 
  write_sf("../storage/ieac_k08-with-vars-v0_0_3/ieac_k08-with-vars-v0_0_3.shp")
```
